articles.title: SA records 2 894 new Covid-19 infections, 30 more deaths By IOL Reporter - IOL
articles.description: A total of 2 894 new Covid-19 cases and 30 Covid-19-related deaths were reported in South Africa on Sunday.
articles.content:
A total of 2894 new Covid-19 cases were reported in South Africa on Sunday.

articles.title: Vodacom consortium wins Ethiopia operating licence - TechCentral
articles.description: Ethiopia has awarded a new telecommunications licence to a consortium including South Africa's Vodacom Group, paving the way for a long-awaited opening of the sector.
articles.content:
